name: Santo Antônio, historical tour
description: The past and the presentof Salvador in one place. One of the oldest neighborhoods in Salvador, Santo Antonio Alem do Carmo, thatappears in the 1st records from the sec. XVII;is the perfect blend between the old and the new Salvador. Located between the neighborhoods of the Barbalho and Carmo,the last which was once the edge of one of the old city gates. Full of historical monuments such as the parish church (1813) and the fort (1703) named equal. Santo Antonio Alem do Carmo, the neighborhood that has under gone a restructuring, now has a range of galleries, cafes, hotels and bars and became a cultural quarter. In addition to its main point, the view point to the Bay of All Saints.
